lejos.hardware.port
Interface BasicSensorPort

All Superinterfaces:
SensorConstants
All Known Subinterfaces:
AnalogPort, I2CPort, LegacySensorPort, UARTPort
All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteAnalogPort, RemoteI2CPort, RemoteIOPort, RemoteMotorPort, RemoteNXTAnalogPort, RemoteNXTI2CPort, RemoteNXTIOPort, RemoteNXTMotorPort, RemoteUARTPort
public interface BasicSensorPort
extends SensorConstants

An abstraction for a sensor port that supports setting and retrieving types and modes of sensors.

Author:
Lawrie Griffiths.
